amendment.description: To set aside certain funding for the construction, acquisition, or improvement of fossil-fueled electric generating plants that utilize carbon sequestration systems.

vote.text: Amendment SA 805 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 805 proposed by Senator Durbin for Senator Cochran. (consideration: CR 10/20/2011 S6848-6849) To set aside certain funding for the construction, acquisition, or improvement of fossil-fueled electric generating plants that utilize carbon sequestration systems.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 805 proposed by Senator Durbin for Senator Cochran.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 805 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
